title: Code Red - Why Developers Will Lead the Energy Revolution
description:
Humans are creating catastrophic levels of warming on Earth that will have detrimental effects on habitability without immediate intervention — a “code red” scenario, declared by the UN Secretary General. However, there are still actionable ways we can get ahead of the worst climate change effects. Octopus Energy US CEO, Michael Lee, will discuss how developers can use their skills to help transform our energy systems, and revolutionize every household through the use of software and proprietary technology as we transition to a renewable powered future.

#PWC2022 attracted nearly 375 attendees from 36 countries and 21 time zones making it the biggest and best year yet. The highly engaging format featured 90 speakers, 6 tracks (including 80 talks and 4 tutorials) and took place virtually on March 21-25, 2022 on LoudSwarm by Six Feet Up.

More information about the conference can be found at: https://2022.pythonwebconf.com
